matchset.left: A medhod of perserving information useful to others in understanding an informatin system.
A method used t make sections of source code more visible.
A method of listing items vertically so that they are esier to read quickly.
Information inserted into a source code file for documentation of hte program.
A set of comment lines used to help separate the functions and other sections of a program.
Convey the relationship or big picture of the various functions in a program.
